text: NK Alam Chowdhury is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Nilphamari-1. ==Career== Chowdhury was elected to parliament from Nilphamari-1 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1996. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: NK Alam Chowdhury
